committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating February 22d through February 29, 1976, as Saviour's Day Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the week of February 22-29, 1976, as "Saviour's Day."

titles.title: Joint resolution designating February 22d through February 29, 1976, as Saviour's Day Week.
